Name: Cucumber (PH)
Description: Technically a fruit, but widely used as a vegetable. Pickling these is common.

DescriptionLocalization.ko: Technically a fruit, but widely used as a vegetable. Pickling these is common.
DescriptionLocalization.de: Technisch gesehen eine Frucht, aber weit verbreitet als Gemüse. Wird häufig eingelegt.
DescriptionLocalization.fr: Technically a fruit, but widely used as a vegetable. Pickling these is common.

DescriptionLocalization.pt: Technically a fruit, but widely used as a vegetable. Pickling these is common.
DescriptionLocalization.ru: Формально является фруктом, но широко распространен как овощ. Обычно используется в мариновании.

DescriptionLocalization.zh: 严格来说，它是一种水果，但被广泛用作蔬菜。
